org.cougaar.core.qos.ca
Interface Facet

All Superinterfaces:
BlackboardExecutor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AlarmServiceSleeperFacet, BeanToFactFacetImpl, CommunityFacetImpl, FacetImpl, FactToFrameFacetImpl, FrameToFactFacetImpl, MetricsReaderFacet, MetricsWriterFacet, QueryFacet, ResponseFacet, SleeperFacet, ThreadServiceSleeperFacet
public interface Facet
extends BlackboardExecutor

A Facet represents a role in CoordinationArtifact, from the perspective of the Artifact itself. RolePlayers interact with Facets through a Receptacle handle. This naming convention is deliberately suggestive of the CORBA Component Model, since the functions of these two interfaces are roughly equivalent to the similarly named entities in CCM. By analogy, the CoordinationArtifact itself corresponds to a CCM Component.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface org.cougaar.core.qos.ca.BlackboardExecutor
execute, processFactBase, setupSubscriptions
